snippet.title: Ars Notoria Playtest Gameplay
snippet.description:
Hi everyone! We've prepared a gameplay video of the playtesting build. It includes the beginning of the game and then skips a few in-game days to show the crafting and building process without spending too much time harvesting resources. 

We will upload more gameplay videos soon and also launch the playtest. Please check our Discord channel for more updates. Thank you for watching the video!
